TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataBindingSchemaProvider

Docs.summary: Provides an interface for design-time access to a schema provider in a design host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The IDataBindingSchemaProvider class is implemented by design hosts, such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], that host the data-binding dialog box to show schema.

Docs.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the provider can refresh the schema.
Docs.value: , if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RefreshSchema(bool preferSilent) cil managed

Docs.param: to disable data-binding events until after the schema has been refreshed; to enable the events.
Docs.summary: Refreshes the schema for the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The RefreshSchema method is called by the design host only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema%2A> property is `true`.

Docs.summary: Gets the current schema object for the designer.
Docs.value: The current schema object for the designer.
